title: Is Zac going to get unreworked like Kog'Maw?
body:
I wouldn't make this thread if i didn't know about the possibility of an unrework, which happened with Kog'Maw.

But let's face it. Zac's rework is so boring and unreliable. His ult is so hard to place properly and even when it works, it doesn't feel satisfying at all.

His kit was already reliant on his E landing, now every part of his kit is a hit-or-miss.

His damage is gutted, so when you miss your abilities you are just useless in a teamfight.

He just feels boring in general. Please riot, unrework him like you did with Kog'maw.

Seriously Zac was fine!!! He didn't need a rewok, he was balanced, useful and felt great. His rework was uncalled for!

Kog maw was not technically unreworked he had faster attack speed and minor bonus damage, the "unrework" gave kogmaw even higher damage and the power to shred tanks into little snow flakes, and kogmaw never received a full on gameplay update, unlike other champions they gave them new mechanics changed or created new abilitys, he had alot of change in stats,as well as damage.

zac does not need to receive an unrework, his new kit is pretty good and funny to watch, honestly no offense but your opinions arent important to riot, they look at the communitys needs, and what the community needs is........ YASUO TO BE NERFED. thats a new topic.
